Simple example

```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <p>value: {{ model }}</p>
        <input-time-picker class="w-f1" v-model="model" v-bind="props"></input-time-picker>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            model: '16:45',
            props: {
                placeholder: 'Pick a time',
                timepicker: {
                    step: { h: 1, m: 5 },
                },
            },
        };
    },
};
</script>
```
